title: Babar and Zephir
description: In the most fantastical of the classic Babar stories, we follow Zephir, Babarâ€™s monkey friend, home on school holiday. The monkey princess, Isabelle, has been kidnapped by the horned monster Polomoche, and everyone is very worried. But Zephir, with the help of a tiny mermaid named Eleanore, is certain that he can save the princess himself.
author: Jean de Brunhoff
